reviews.review: Portal 2 is a puzzle game with portals. The gameplay is extremely fun and makes you think what to do so you can beat each chamber. This game has extremely nice humor and it always makes me laugh with the jokes. Its graphics are beautiful for a 2012 game, and your eyes aren't going to suffer with flashy lights. The level design has improved a lot when compared to Portal 1's level design, now you aren't going to get lost in a level most of the time. This game is astonishing and amazing. Would buy 3 times.

The idea of a girl letting liquids go through wide holes she makes, while going deeper and deeper into the rabbit hole, must entertain the mind of every decent man. 
10 oz of sticky gel out of 10
first heard about this game when i was like 10 i ab obsessed with it still and want more of it god i wish there was a portal 3 or hl3 to continue the story masterpiece of a game
Very good game, if you liked portal, then you'll like this.

A game you can play at your own pace, with decent graphics on old hardware. AI humor is all over the place, so even if you're alone, well... You're not alone. Some rooms can hold you for half an hour, and community content keeps being produced to this day.

yes very cool game 

play with good pc or you will suffer
still didn't get stepped on, but at least I got to see the moon
